flawed_nl_solution:
The sum of mangoes, pears and pawpaws is 18+10+12 = <<18+10+12=36>>36
The total number of fruits is 58 so the last two baskets contain 58-36 = <<58-36=22>>22 fruits
Each of the last two baskets contains an equal amount of fruits which is 22/2 = <<22/2=11>>11 fruits
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
